title: My account got hacked and the submit form but cant remember purchase and date
body: So my account just got recently hacked, I'm doing the submit form but It's asking me what was my first purchase and the date I did It how am I supposed to know that without going to my purchase history In the game?

replies.body: Questions asked during account recovery exist to help make sure it's being restored to the rightful owner and for your security.  Do your best to answer the questions as best you can.  Feel free to ask any questions in your ticket once an account specialist responds.  Good luck!
